response.answer_text: No, she is naturally skinny and does a lot of cardio (dancing) because of her job and the fact that she is the main dancer of Blackpink. She has also been shown to workout in addition to all the activity she does for her job. She may be very skinny, but she has not exhibited the mindset or behavior of someone with anorexia or other similar eating disorders (she doesn’t avoid eating, doesn’t seem to have body dysmorphia, isn’t picky/obsessive about the food she eats (such as having safe foods or foods she avoids at all costs, etc), isn’t regretful/self hating after binging/eating, and doesn’t seem to pay too much attention to the calorie count of what she eats).
